name: ZombieKiller
description:
ZombieKiller is a game made in a week to test my skills as a developer. It is a topdown shooter where the objective is to kill all the zombies during the different waves in different scenarios.

Controls are easy and intuitive:

ASDW to move.
Move the cursor to rotate and aim.
R to recharge.
F to put down the gun.

I hope you like it. Enjoy!

Assets by: Kenney (@KenneyNL on Twitter)
